title: Iqra University celebrates it’s alumna achievement in AFL Asian Games
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 25 (APP):Iqra University is proud to celebrate the remarkable achievements of its distinguished alumna, Ms. Samina Majeed in the AFL Asian Games 2023.
Hailing from Hyderabad, Hunza, Ms. Majeed graduated in Fashion Designing from Iqra University in 2022, and a press release on Monday said.
Ms. Majeed recently represented Pakistan with great honor and pride in the AFL Asian Games 2023 in Thailand, showcasing her exceptional talents as a footy player. This achievement follows her previous representation of Pakistan in Footy 2017 in Australia.
Looking ahead with determination, Ms. Majeed eagerly anticipates the International World Cup 2024 in Singapore, where she will once again wear the Pakistani jersey with immense pride.
Samina Majeed’s journey from Iqra University graduate to international athlete is an inspiring example of the institution’s commitment to nurturing talent and empowering individuals to shine on the global stage.
